title: Burundi Money Supply M0
description: Money Supply M0 in Burundi remained unchanged at 955157 BIF Million in May from 955157 BIF Million in April of 2022. Money Supply M0 in Burundi averaged 408377.04 BIF Million from 2008 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 2716987.50 BIF Million in September of 2021 and a record low of 113890 BIF Million in January of 2008. This page provides - Burundi Money Supply M0- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of Burundi
